title: Govt presents poor friendly budget: PMLN leaders
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 13 (APP):PMLN leader MNA Shaista Pervez Malik said that the federal government has presented poor friendly budget without any new tax on general public.
Talking to media persons outside of the Parliament House here Friday, she said that it was the too priority agenda of the incumbent regime to provide maximum relief to the low income class.
Shaista reiterated that the government has increased the salaries of government employees with the current ratio of inflation.
The incumbent regime is making all possible steps to make the national economy strong and reduce the pressure of inflation. It is the responsibility of all Muslim states to give the shut up call to Israel and put pressure on international community to play role to stop thisÂ  Iran and Israel war, she said.
PMLN MNA Qasim Noon expressed that Israel did a major mistake to attack on Iran. He said that some elements wanted to disturb the peaceful environment and development of this region.
Commenting on the current budget, he added that the government had presented the budget with the consensus of the allies. He said that top brass of PMLN was committed to give the relief to masses. Inflation is an international issue and under developing countries facing many challenges in this regard, he added.
